Add `Document`, `Project`, and `Achievement` models with basic CRUD and uploads.

Tasks:
- Implement `Document` model with file uploads and metadata
- Implement `Project` model with members, screenshots, and language metadata
- Implement `Achievement` models (contests, contributions, GSoC entries)
- Add admin/UI and tests

Related issue: https://github.com/Atostrain445/skills-integrate-mcp-with-copilot/issues/11
